title: Sound On: Biden 's First Press Conference, Disinformation
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden 's First Press Conference, Disinformation
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Rep. John Katko, a Republican representing New York's 24th congressional district, and former Virginia Congressman Denver Riggleman, Chief Strategist at the Network Contagion Research Institute.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
